title: Berry polenta muffins
ingredients: ['120g plain flour', '100g polenta (cornmeal)', '100g caster sugar', '2 1/2 teaspoons baking powder', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '325g chopped fresh strawberries', '225g naturally flavoured strawberry yoghurt', '4 tablespoons butter, melted', '1 egg, lightly beaten']
